sentences.en: Accordingly, the practice that retires ahead of schedule must give stoutly prohibit.

sentences.en: Certainly, they can not also do or prohibit to do some matters.

sentences.en: In most of the residence halls we visited, rules prohibit disorderly conduct.

sentences.en: Laws must be put through to prohibit this act.

sentences.en: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the factory.
The air force and the navy retain their prohibition of women on air combat missions.

sentences.en: You'd let a mouse, or mice, prohibit a project which will benefitmillions of people?
